text: Rancid may refer to * Rancid (band), an American punk band, and their self- titled releases: ** Rancid (EP), the above group's self-titled debut EP ** Rancid (1993 album), their first full-length album ** Rancid (2000 album), another self-titled album * Rancid (movie), a 2004 Swedish movie * RANCID, network management software * Rancid News, a punk magazine * Rancidification, the oxidation of fats, fatty acids, and edible oils
title: Rancid
